title: Design and Implement VNet Architecture (Terraform)
description: Define Virtual Network, Subnets (AKS, Gateway, PrivateLink), and NSG rules using Terraform AzureRM provider.
sprint_goal: Establish Core Infrastructure and Authentication Foundation
acceptance_criteria: VNet created with non-overlapping CIDR; Subnets isolated; NSGs configured
risk_mitigation: Review CIDR ranges with NetSec team

title: Provision PostgreSQL Flexible Server (Terraform)
description: Deploy PostgreSQL Flexible Server with High Availability (Zone Redundant) and Private Endpoint connection to VNet.
sprint_goal: Establish Core Infrastructure and Authentication Foundation
acceptance_criteria: Postgres running in VNet; HA enabled; Private Link DNS working
definition_of_done: Connection verified from temporary VM in VNet

title: Configure PostGIS and Database Schema Initialization
description: Create initialization scripts to enable 'postgis' extension and set up initial database roles/users for microservices.
sprint_goal: Establish Core Infrastructure and Authentication Foundation
acceptance_criteria: PostGIS extension enabled; App users created; Migration pipeline ready
definition_of_done: Script executes successfully on fresh DB
risk_mitigation: RISK-PERF-005: Validate geospatial query plans early

title: Implement NestJS Passport Azure AD Strategy
description: Develop auth module using `passport-azure-ad`. Configure JWT validation against B2C metadata endpoint.
sprint_goal: Establish Core Infrastructure and Authentication Foundation
acceptance_criteria: JWT validation against B2C; 401 on invalid tokens
risk_mitigation: RISK-SEC-002: Implement automated token validation tests

title: Setup WebSocket Gateway with Redis Adapter
description: Configure NestJS WebSocket module. Implement Redis adapter for horizontal scaling of socket servers.
sprint_goal: Establish Core Infrastructure and Authentication Foundation
acceptance_criteria: WS server accepts connections; Redis propagates messages

title: Setup WatermelonDB Schema and Database
description: Define local schema for Service Requests, Notes, and Products. Configure WatermelonDB adapter for iOS/Android.
sprint_goal: Establish Core Infrastructure and Authentication Foundation
acceptance_criteria: Local DB initializes; Schema matches backend; CRUD works offline
definition_of_done: Schema verified on iOS and Android simulators

title: Provision AKS Cluster with CNI Networking
description: Create AKS cluster module with Azure CNI, Node Pools (System/User), and Role-Based Access Control integrated with AAD.
sprint_goal: Core Service Logic and Mobile Foundation
acceptance_criteria: Cluster reachable via kubectl; RBAC enabled

title: Implement Azure Graph API Client Service
description: Create service wrapper for Microsoft Graph API to programmatically create users in B2C tenant.
sprint_goal: Core Service Logic and Mobile Foundation
acceptance_criteria: User creation reflects in B2C; Duplicate email handling
definition_of_done: Integration test creating test user in B2C

title: Implement User Sync to PostgreSQL
description: Develop registration controller that coordinates B2C creation and local Postgres record creation in a transaction.
sprint_goal: Core Service Logic and Mobile Foundation
acceptance_criteria: Local DB syncs with B2C; Rollback on failure

title: Design and Implement Service Center Geo-Entity
description: Create TypeORM entity for Service Center with `geometry` column for service areas (Polygon) and location (Point).
sprint_goal: Core Service Logic and Mobile Foundation
acceptance_criteria: Entity supports GeoJSON; Spatial index created

title: Integrate Native Background Location Library
description: Install and configure `react-native-background-geolocation` or similar. Configure permissions for 'Always' usage.
sprint_goal: Core Service Logic and Mobile Foundation
acceptance_criteria: Permissions requested correctly; Service persists in background
definition_of_done: Tested on physical iOS and Android devices
risk_mitigation: RISK-TECH-001: Early prototype on real devices

title: Implement Synchronization Engine
description: Develop sync logic using WatermelonDB sync protocol. Handle pull (server changes) and push (local changes) phases.
sprint_goal: Core Service Logic and Mobile Foundation
acceptance_criteria: Delta sync works; Auto-sync on network restore
definition_of_done: Sync conflicts resolved via server-wins strategy
risk_mitigation: RISK-DATA-003: Implement strict conflict resolution policies

title: Implement Point-in-Polygon Routing Query
description: Develop repository method using `ST_Intersects` or `ST_Contains` to find Service Centers covering a user's lat/long.
acceptance_criteria: Correct centers returned for coords; Performance < 100ms

title: Implement Location Ingestion WebSocket Event
description: Create socket event handler for 'location_update'. Validate user. Throttle DB writes (write to Redis cache first).
acceptance_criteria: High freq updates accepted; Unauthorized emitters rejected

title: Implement Location Broadcasting to User
description: Logic to broadcast technician location from Redis to specific User socket room associated with Service Request.
acceptance_criteria: Updates received < 2s latency; Room isolation enforced

title: Implement Location Emitter Service (Mobile)
description: Create service to bridge native location updates to WebSocket connection. Implement buffering for network loss scenarios.
acceptance_criteria: Coords sent to WS; Buffer flushes on reconnect
